org.fujion.plotly.plot

Class PlotOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.plotly.plot.PlotOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlotArea, PlotBar, PlotBox, PlotCandlestick, PlotCarpet, PlotChoropleth, PlotContour, PlotContourCarpet, PlotHeatMap, PlotHeatMapGL, PlotHistogram, PlotHistogram2D, PlotHistogram2DContour, PlotMesh3D, PlotOHLC, PlotParallelCoords, PlotPie, PlotPointCloud, PlotSankey, PlotScatter, PlotScatter3D, PlotScatterCarpet, PlotScatterGeo, PlotScatterGL, PlotScatterMapBox, PlotScatterPolar, PlotScatterPolarGL, PlotScatterTernary, PlotSurface, PlotTable, PlotViolin

    public abstract class PlotOptions
extends Options
    Base class for all plot types.

    • Field Detail

      • customdata

        @Option
public Object[] customdata
        Assigns extra data to each datum. This may be useful when listening to hover, click and selection events. Note that, "scatter" traces also appends customdata items in the markers DOM elements.

      • hoverInfo

        @Option
public String hoverInfo
        Any combination of "x", "y", "z", "text", "name" joined with a "+" OR "all" or "none" or "skip". examples: "x", "y", "x+y", "x+y+z", "all" default: "all" Determines which trace information appear on hover. If "none" or "skip" are set, no information is displayed upon hovering. But, if "none" is set, click and hover events are still fired.

      • hoverlabel

        @Option
public final HoverLabelOptions hoverlabel
        Style options for hover labels.

      • ids

        @Option
public String[] ids
        Assigns id labels to each datum. These ids for object constancy of data points during animation.

      • legendgroup

        @Option
public String legendgroup
        Traces that are part of the same legend group hide/show at the same time when toggling legend items.

      • name

        @Option
public String name
        The trace name appears as the legend item and on hover.

      • opacity

        @Option
public Double opacity
        The opacity of the trace.

        Constraints: ≥0 and ≤1

      • selectedpoints

        @Option
public int[] selectedpoints
        Array containing integer indices of selected points. Has an effect only for traces that support selections. Note that an empty array means an empty selection where the "unselected" are turned on for all points, whereas, any other non-array values means no selection all where the "selected" and "unselected" styles have no effect.

      • showlegend

        @Option
public Boolean showlegend
        Determines whether or not an item corresponding to this trace is shown in the legend.

        Default: true

      • stream

        @Option
public final StreamOptions stream
        Options for stream settings.

      • type

        protected PlotType type
        The plot type.

      • visible

        @Option
public PlotOptions.VisibileEnum visible
        Determines whether or not this trace is visible. If "legendonly", the trace is not drawn, but can appear as a legend item (provided that the legend itself is visible). value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlotOptions

        public PlotOptions()
